title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
In the latest in a line of large thefts, a hacker exploited a new algorithmic stablecoin project called Beanstalk on Sunday, draining it of $182 million worth of digital assets.

Verizon's first-quarter profit fell 13%, and executives warned that earnings would be further pressured in the months ahead.

French prosecutors have zeroed in on bonus payments from Renault to an Omani dealership they suspect ended up in companies controlled by Ghosn and his family, according to people familiar with the matter.

Bed Bath & Beyond is fielding interest from potential acquirers of its Buybuy Baby business.

What's News: Business & Finance
